Player History
Drafted in 24th round, 374th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Nestor Urbina (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2015, off Corey Tinker (SEA)...
Injured on 9/12/2015 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/5/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2016...
